ValidationRule.description: For record Type Operation Exception, the Shipping Group or the Client Name are mandatory
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( NOT( $User.BypassVR__c ), ISBLANK( AccountId), ISBLANK( Order_Shipping__c), RecordType.DeveloperName = "Operation_Exception", NOT(ISPICKVAL( Issue_Category__c , "One Retail")), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Issue_Category__c , "Phoenix")), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Issue_Category__c , "Other")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Issue_Category__c, ""))
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You have to complete the Shipping Group or the Client Name
